metadata.title: CVE-2019-15679 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: TightVNC code version 1.3.10 contains heap buffer overflow in InitialiseRFBConnection function, which can potentially result code execution. This attack appear to be exploitable via network connectivity. Pavel Cheremushkin discovered that TightVNC contains a heap buffer overflow vulnerability. An attacker could use it to cause a Denial of Service or possible a remote code execution.

notes.note: mdeslaur> this CVE is for tightvnc, the equivalent flaw was CVE-2018-20748 in libvncserver

criterions.comment: ssvnc package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
tightvnc package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
veyon package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
vncsnapshot package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
x11vnc package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
x2vnc package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
